EmailTemplate.name: OECM Program - Buying power for Private schools (1561470524.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: OECM Program - Buying power for Private schools (1561470524.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Good Morning Ron,
I am sending this email to give you some context around the OECM Program - below is a link to their website.
We would like to share with you how the program can be of financial benefit to your school. https://oecm.ca/about-us <[[https://oecm.ca/about-us]]>
The program is absolutely free, I'd be remiss to ask - Why not take advantage of a 20 million dollar buying program?
My colleague Joan and I will be at Beacon Christian School at 10am this Thursday (June 27th), would you be available for a brief conversation at 11am?
We'd like to drop by if you're available.
Please let us know if this would work for you.
Regards, Liz Rust Business Development Manager, Central Canada 200 Aviva Park Dr, Vaughan, ON L4L 9C7 E-mail: elizabethrust@grandandtoy.com <[[mailto:elizabethrust@grandandtoy.com]]> | Cell: 365-778-8250 Office Supplies | Interiors & Furniture | Print & Documents | Facility Resources | Technology
grandandtoy.com <[[http://grandandtoy.com/]]> business.grandandtoy.com <[[http://business.grandandtoy.com/]]>
